name: Supa Clock Worker Orange
description:
The ClockWorker Orange was one of my first games, back in 2012 i made a shooter on one room with Game Maker 8, 5 years later i came back with Game Maker Studio version on HTML5 and PC download .EXE file for your desktop, This time this version came with more levels and charecters, and a very new stuff is the shop where you can upgrade your skills, buy devices, weapon or hire some assistence, so you can play with both hands or play with some friend on a CO OP experience.

The Clockworker Orange is a great mechanic man but the people on town do not pay well his services or never pay at all, so one day the Orange goes out to charge fruit by fruit all the money they never paid.

#RemakeJam
